## ElementHandle.dragAndDrop() method

This method triggers a dragenter, dragover, and drop on the element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dragAndDrop(target: ElementHandle, options?: {
        delay: number;
    }): Promise<void>;
```

|  options | { delay: number; } |  |
